speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: SCENE IV. A room in ANGELO's house.

speaker: LUCIO
text_entry: Enter ANGELO and ESCALUS

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Every letter he hath writ hath disvouched other.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: In most uneven and distracted manner. His actions

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: show much like to madness: pray heaven his wisdom be

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: not tainted! And why meet him at the gates, and

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: redeliver our authorities there

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I guess not.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: And why should we proclaim it in an hour before his

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: entering, that if any crave redress of injustice,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: they should exhibit their petitions in the street?

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: He shows his reason for that: to have a dispatch of

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: complaints, and to deliver us from devices

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: hereafter, which shall then have no power to stand

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: against us.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Well, I beseech you, let it be proclaimed betimes

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: i' the morn; I'll call you at your house: give

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: notice to such men of sort and suit as are to meet

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: him.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I shall, sir. Fare you well.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Good night.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Exit ESCALUS

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: This deed unshapes me quite, makes me unpregnant

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: And dull to all proceedings. A deflower'd maid!

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: And by an eminent body that enforced

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: The law against it! But that her tender shame

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Will not proclaim against her maiden loss,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: How might she tongue me! Yet reason dares her no;

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: For my authority bears of a credent bulk,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: That no particular scandal once can touch

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: But it confounds the breather. He should have lived,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Save that riotous youth, with dangerous sense,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Might in the times to come have ta'en revenge,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: By so receiving a dishonour'd life

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: With ransom of such shame. Would yet he had lived!

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: A lack, when once our grace we have forgot,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Nothing goes right: we would, and we would not.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Exit
